body.content:
Dear Friend,

Thanks for your mail, I do appreciate
Meanwhile, all the arrangement to put claim over this fund as the Next
of kin to the deceased has been studied for more than One year by me
and I discovered no problem, get the required approval and transfer
this money to a reign account has been put in place and directives and
needed information will be relayed to you as soon as you indicate your
interest and willingness to assist me and also benefit your self to
this great business opportunity. I can not carry out this deal alone
because of my position in this country as a civil servant(A Banker),we
are not allowed to operate a foreign account and would eventually
raise an eye brow on my side during the time of transfer because I
work with the same bank as Chief General
operation officer. This is the actual reason why it will require a second
foreign party or fellow who will forward claims as the next of kin

I will not fail to inform you that this transaction is 100% risk free.
On smooth conclusion of this transaction, we will negotiate on a
sharing ratio that will benefit each party. Please, you have been
advised to keep it as a "top secret" as I am still in service and
intend to retire from service after I conclude this deal with you
I shall retire from service immediately this funds hit your account
If you indicate interest then I shall forward to you an Application to
fill, send a
copy to me and a copy to these bank through email address
I have all the Vital and secret In formations that will make these
bank grant us Approval
I hope you will not betray me after the transaction?
I hope you understood me correctly?
Feel free to call me anytime OK
I await your positive response
Regard
Mr Ahmed Edelbore
Phone:00228 98846305

Please Note.  the only fee that will take place if we get Approval is
the Reactivation of the account it must be reopen by the Next of Kin,
pray Approval is granted to us
The Reactivation is $565 official fee which you and I will handle
equally by sharing the fee together $282 for me and same $282 for you
then after the transfer we shall deduct our fee from them before
sharing the funds in your country
Look, I have all what it takes for us to get Approval and do not
respond to any mail from the bank without my advice OK
Our Next stage is Application Form
